title: William Hill - Sports Betting & Odds
description:

GREAT FEATURES AND BETTING BONUSES

¢	#YourOdds: Got a hunch on the game? Tweet @WilliamHill with your bet and our traders will endeavour to price it up.
¢	Bet Boost: Whether you include Premier League, the big fight or a Grand Slam, boost your accas of three or more selections - it's our biggest ever Bet Boost!
¢	Flash Odds: Get the best enhancement ahead of the big game. From 6pm, Flash Odds goes live, so whether its the man of the moment to score or hit the target, these arent to be missed.
¢	Bet and watch live sports: Theres no better feeling than seeing your bet win ì we stream heaps of football, horse racing, tennis and more on our app.
¢	Cash In: You can win even if your bet doesnt with Cash In. Its your opportunity to accept an early pay out offer while the action is on-going.
¢	Partial Cash Out: For those seeking the best of both worlds ì get something back on your bet early, while waiting for the rest to play out.
¢	In-play: Bet on countless in-play markets now with advanced, in-depth scoreboards so you know exactly whats happening. Whether theres been a yellow card or corner kick, itll be tracked keeping you across all of the action.

HERE TO HELP
William Hill takes Responsible Gambling seriously because betting shouldnt get in the way of your enjoyment of sport.

We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.

---- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ------

Football betting becomes social!

- possibility to choose your favorite leagues

title: BetConnect - Sports Betting
description:
Betconnect is the worlds only social betting network that gives you access to the bets of professional gamblers. We send you personalised bets - each called a Bet Request - direct from the Pros for you to Match. 
You decide what to do next. Do you Follow or Lay? Whatever sport you bet on, weve got Pros who want to bet on it ì from football to rugby, from golf to horseracing, weve got you covered.

What is betconnect?

Real Pro Gamblers

Our Pros are real professional gamblers who are restricted or closed by the bookies due to their success. Why else would they pay us a commission to get their bets placed and share their tips?

In It Together

Our Pros are putting their money where their mouth is ì every Bet Request is the ultimate tip. Each one is being backed by one of our Pros. You can trust that they want winners just as much as you.

Crowd Betting

Every Bet Request you receive is just the útipù of the iceberg - our pros are using staking much much more.   Our technology intelligently splits the stake and distributes, via the betconnect network, to Punters like you, so you can share in their success.   

Time Is Money

Every Bet Request is so good you need to act fast to maximise value. Time is of the essence as you only have 15 minutes to Match and make your next decision¶

The Benefits Are All Yours!

When you Follow a Bet Request by placing it with other bookmakers you get to take advantage of their Free Bet, Money Back Special and Best Odds Guaranteed promotions. If you lay a Bet Request on betconnect and you beat the Pro you pay zero commission on your profits.

How Does It Work?

Step 1:   Connect

We Connect you to a network of professional gamblers. Restricted and often closed by the bookies due to their success, they have bets they want to place. Thats where you come in! Youll be notified when the betconnect algorithm allocates you a Bet Request that meets your betting preferences.  Whether you like football, rugby, horse racing, golf, tennis or something a little more niche, the pros on betconnect are betting on it!

Don't want to wait?  Press the betconnect button to be next in the queue.

Step 2:  Match

Unlock the Bet Request to reveal details of the bet and get the ultimate tip! You now have 15 minutes to Match it on betconnect, safe in the knowledge that the same odds or better are available with the bookmakers¶ meanwhile you move on nicely to step 3.

Step 3:  Follow

Here's where it gets interesting....

Just how good is this pro?

Love the bet?  Then Follow....

Believe in the power of the Pro and Follow the same bet with your own money. Simply Match the Bet Request on betconnect and place the same stake plus your own stake with any bookie who is offering the same odds or better. Get Involved!

Don't love it?  Then Lay...

Be brave and bet against the Pro by becoming the bookie!  Simply Match the Bet Request and do nothing further.  Will bravery triumph over experience?


So, download betconnect today, join the world's first social betting network and get Bet Requests and tips on all your favourite sports.   Your best bets are on betconnect.

See how it works - https://betconnect.com/punter/demo

title: Infogol ì Football Scores & Betting Tips
description:
≠ê≠ê≠êNew for 2019/20 Season≠ê≠ê≠ê

Now includes FRENCH LIGUE 1

Get more out of the beautiful game with the perfect football statistic companion. As well as live scores and in-play expected goals (xG) features, youll get tips, stats and features from our team of analysts to help compliment your football form study. öΩ Major FIFA & UEFA tournaments

MATCHES
PRE-MATCH: The pre-match summary gives you helpful insight including the ANALYST VERDICT on the match. Well also bring you the line-ups and form guides, as well as our unique SMART STATS and FLAGS.

IN-PLAY: Unable to watch the match? Get LIVE SCORE UPDATES and keep up to date with the latest action and odds on the Matches screen. And in our latest update weve added a HALF-TIME TEAM TALK. Based on the events of the first half and the pre-match expectations, our model gives you helpful in-running football predictions to allow you to bet in-play.

RESULT: Find out WHO SCORED each goal and shoot over to the MAPS screen to see the quality to each teams chances. Get football results QUICKLY and EASILY! Hit the STATS button and you will get in-depth analysis of the match including statistics for passes, shots on target and much, much more.

STATS
LEAGUES: Get great coverage of some of the top football competitions around the world. For each league you can see the current table standings as well as our interpretation of where each team should be NOW and at the END OF THE SEASON based on our model. 

TEAMS: Choose a team from any of the leagues and get a summary of their performance, results and fixtures lists, squad details and a whole host of FOOTBALL STATS to help you understand more about the teams style of play and their strengths and weaknesses in attack and defence.

PLAYERS: Get CAREER PROFILES for every player, including their stats in the current season and those gone by, and check the TOP SCORER charts. We also give football betting predictions in the FIRST TO SCORE and ANYTIME GOALSCORER markets.

TIPS, PREDICTIONS & PREVIEWS
Get free football predictions, free bets and betting tips based on the data from our EXPECTED GOALS MODEL. Whether you like to bet on the result of the match (Home, Draw, Away), Overs/Unders or Both Teams to Score, our soccer tips have got you covered. Get PUSH NOTIFICATIONS for your FAVOURITE TEAMS and SELECTED MATCHES. For each match, simply tap a Star to be notified of the Line-ups, Analyst Verdict and Half-Time Team Talk. And you can also be notified of the Analysts BEST BETS.

QUALITY OVER QUANTITY
Infogol is so much more than just another flash Live Scores football app. The strength of the app lies in the super quality of the analysis, based on our in-house developed models, powered by Opta data.

The Infogol analysts also use their knowledge to help assess a teams rating based on past performances, manager or player changes, etc. Combining the knowledge of the analysts with the figures produced by the models means that Infogol is the ultimate app and has unrivalled power when it comes to football tips and predictions.

description:

title: One Game Betting Tips
description:
Sports betting for us here at RVeasy Sports is a pleasurable experience. User are making money with our betting tips that are sure to deliver success day by day and this is not just a claim, its happening! A lot of apps out there claim offering 100% betting tips or free betting tips with actually no prove of what they promise. We do not promise to offer you fixed odds however our predictions are one of the best you can find in the betting prediction industry. 

We provide premium betting predictions that will most definitely increase your bankroll exponentially. Other apps provide you with 3, 5, to 10 accumulated games with high odds of 10 to 100 odds and above which as you've experienced are not professional in managing your bankroll. Our approach is different. 

This app (One Game Betting Tips) provides only One Game with an average odd of 1.90 on a daily basis to users. And because not every match can be predicted with certainty, a day (no reliable games) might be skipped in some weeks. The idea is that the probability of success is abated when more games are accumulated hence, we use all resources to find ONLY ONE GAME that must go right! 

Over the years we have habituated success by employing this method of prediction that we thought people like you with no betting experience could really make money with our sports betting expertise. Definitely, our background in statistical analysis and expert betting knowledge in International Soccer could deliver impressive profits while maintaining a high win rate. Our extensive analysis gives us the edge as football betting gurus and allow our associates to make enormousness profit with time.

Our Clientele 
We have associates all over the world from United States, Brazil, Nigeria, Ghana, Kenya, England, Germany, France, Netherlands, Italy, Spain, Indonesia, Russia, Korea, Czech Republic, Romania, Bulgaria, Greece, Switzerland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Finland, Portugal, Tunisia, Philippines, Taiwan, Turkey and so on.

How We Pick Games
We employ Machine Learning algorithms on football historical data and finalize our selection process with the endorsement by a crew of analyst. Our crew members includes famous betting tipsters, expert former footballers and expert former technical managers. As we see it Machine Learning has its limits, hence only picks accepted by the crew haven been filtered by a powerful statistical instrument are posted to users. You might think the process is laborious for just One Game. That is because we operate by the principle of "bet on certainty" otherwise NO "reliable predictions". Our most preferred market is the Win Draw Win or 1x2, although other options are predicted such as Home/Away/Draw no bet, Double Chance, Under/Over (Under-Over), HT/FT, GG/NG (Both teams to score or BTS) and others available on popular bookmakers.

We currently search for tips from over 180 leagues, although we are very fond of predicting leagues from NETHERLANDS, FRANCE, CZECH REPUBLIC, GREECE, ENGLAND, GEORGIA, ISRAEL, JORDAN, MALTA, SWEDEN, SAUDI ARABIA, UNITED ARAB EMIRATES, ITALY, PORTUGAL, RUSSIA, SPAIN, SCOTLAND, TURKEY, NORTHERN IRELAND,ARGENTINA, BAHRAIN, ROMANIA, BELGIUM,  GERMANY, DENMARK.

title: Free Betting Tips on MMA
description:
Bet MMA is an MMA handicapper directory of the top MMA tipsters in the business. We give out both free and paid (mostly free) MMA betting tips / picks on the UFC and other MMA orgs such as WSOF, Bellator and One FC. Anyone can sign up as a handicapper; this isn't a closed shop... So whoever does well ends up leading the table and giving you the best picks! 

MMA is the fastest growing sport in the world - why not bet on it? If you already get free sports betting tips for football, basketball, baseball, golf, boxing, NFL... whatever... I am confident our handicappers can match any other sports tipsters out there and ultimately, make you money, which is what matters!

We have clear and easy to understand betting histories for all the handicappers, making it easy to see who's worth following. When you do follow someone, you can receive email notifications whenever that MMA handicappers makes a new prediction. 

Introduction to me and why use this app? 
BetMMA.tips is run by me, Mike Jeynes, a long time sports and MMA fan living in Leeds, UK. I've been working in MMA full time since 2009 and branched into betting on the UFC as an interesting project in 2014.

So why use this app? Plenty of people offer betting tips but very few of them are independently verified. If you're following some dude who set up his own app and offers his own tips, do you honestly believe their stated profit history when they can basically say whatever they like? It doesn't matter to me which handicapper ends up being profitable so I don't need to fake any results or hide bad picks: We've got plenty of MMA handicappers (128 at the time of writing) so the cream rises to the top and you follow those picks! 

The app also includes betting tools:
- A free surebet / arbitrage calculator.
- A parlay / accumulator odds calculator.
- Odds conversion tool.
- Guides to betting on MMA written by myself.
- A log of which bookmakers tend to offer the best odds on MMA / The UFC. 

All for free, so check it out! :)

title: Valuebet App - Betting Tips
description:
The Valuebet App is a sports betting price comparison app to help Sports Bettors with betting tips and strategies to win more sports bets by comparing the price of their Odds to the Market price to determine its value. The key to successful sports betting or any form of gambling is to extract value from a bet. Value means that the odds you are getting is better than the 'Market' Odds. Finding underpriced odds and making consistent value bets will ensure long-term betting success. The app is a value bet calculator that simplifies the math for the user.

Sports bettors usually bet on emotions or bias information. Imagine before buying a phone, you do a price comparison. If the phone is priced on the market at $150, but you can buy it at $110, then you are getting value. Conversely, if the phone is priced at $100 and you are paying $110, then you are overpaying. This principle can be applied to Sports Betting. If you are paying $110 for a bet that should be priced at $150, then you are getting value.

Winning at sports betting in the long-term is not about picking winners, but about finding value. The Valuebet App helps sports bettor win more bets by allowing them to input the odds they receive, and compare it to the other odds available on the market. They will then be able to know which bet is a good value bet, and which bet is a bad bet.  This will prevent sports bettors from making bad bets where they overpay for a sports bet.

Key Features:
	¢	Input your Odds
	¢	Compare your Odds to the market
	¢	See if you are getting value based on the Value Points
	¢	Get notified whenever there is a big line movement
	¢	Only make bets where you are getting value
	¢	Win more Sports Bets
	¢	FREE to use everyday

Step 1: Sign up with your Name and Email
Step 2: Upon registration, you will receive 2 FREE tokens daily
Step 3: Go to the Available screen and see the games that you want to unlock
Step 4: Unlock the games you want, which will be moved to òWatching
Step 5: Go to òWatching screen and see the data about the games you unlocked
Step 6: Adjust the Odds and Price in òWatching to compare it to the market

See our FAQ for more details: http://valuebet.co/help-center/

Check out our Blog to learn how the Valuebet App can help you win more Sports Bets: http://valuebet.co/blog/


***The Value Bet Pro app is coming later, with many features and enhancements to make it even to make value bets. Make the value bet app the only sports betting app you'll ever need.***

The Valuebet app is not a sportsbook, and is not affiliated with any betting or gambling sites. The Valuebet is a sports betting app and tool that gives betting tips by comparing user's Odds against the Market Odds. 

The Valuebet App makes watching sports more enjoyable as a casual bettor by giving the user a value edge over the person they are betting with. Betting with you friends can let you enjoy things such as a win free meal, or  the next round of beer. 

Regardless whether you are a professional bettor who needs a simple by highly useful value bet app calculator, or a casual bettor looking for a small edge by finding value bets, the Valuebet App caters to both type. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.

title: Football Betting Tips : Free Football Prediction
description:
Statistical prediction is a method used in sports betting, to predict the outcome of matches by means of statistical tools and using complex math formulas. 

  

Who doesnt want to predict the result of a football (soccer) match? The best way to make a prognosis is to estimate the probability of the outcome. 

You cannot work out the probability of winning a football match by assuming that win, lose and draw are equally likely, 

but you can look at previous results in similar matches and use these results to estimate the probability of winning. 

  

Football Prediction app doesn't have emotions and it doesn't support any club. It knows nothing about the number of fans or the amount of money clubs have. 

The only thing that matters are previous results and based on them it predicts the future results. 

And it's really good at it. 

  

This application tracks all league matches of the world most famous leagues including: 

-  England 

-  Spain 

-  Germany 

-  Italy 

-  France 

-  Netherlands 

-  Portugal 

-  Turkey 

-  Russia 

-  Belgium 

-  Polen 

-  Czech Republic 

-  Scotland 

-  Romania 

-  Austria 

-  Hungary 

-  Ukraine 

-  Sweden 

-  Norway 

-  Greece 

  

  

There are many other leagues too and we are constantly trying to increase the number of leagues. 

If you can't find your local league, use "manual input" and enter performance data by yourself. You will get an equally good calculation. 

  

The app will estimate the probability of particular match outcome and derivatives of an outcome, such as: 

-  Full Time Outcome, 

-  Half Time Result, 

-  Double Chance, 

-  Draw No Bet, 

-  HT/FT, 

-  Handicap, 

-  Goals Under/Over, 

-  Exact Goals, 

-  Exact Score. 

  

Everything is transparent and beautifully organized by leagues, seasons and by rounds so that every match, pre-match predictions and the results of matches can easily be found. 

Data used to predict the match are the ones that were available before the match was played. 

Once you download data you can use the application in an offline mode. 

  

This is not a live score app but results are refreshed at least once a day which is enough for quality predictions. 

  

We don't need to give you false promises about how good is app, at any time you can check all previous predictions and their efficiency in reviews organized by leagues, odds type and time period. 

  

IMPORTANT NOTE: This application does not encourage sports betting in any way, it is intended for informational and entertainment purposes only! 

  

This is a FREE version (Ad - supported), if you like Football Prediction you can buy the version without ads through a link in our app.

title: BetMines Free Football Betting Tips & Predictions
description:
Over 400,000 users rely on BetMines. Follow our daily betting tips for football, analyse team statistics, follow other tipsters bets, test your strategy by creating free virtual football bets, follow livescore and much more!

BetMines is a totally free football betting support application that offers several tools to help you increase your success rate and teach you how to bet!

---- DAILY TIPS ----

We are the best football predictions and football tips app. We provide FREE and accurate daily football betting predictions and tips for each match elaborated by an artificial intelligence algorithm constantly evolving.
The algorithm takes into account the history of the results of the teams, the state of recent form, head-2-head matches, home and away performances, statistical data of the reference league, any sidelined player, the fluctuation of odds (provided by an important bookmaker) and on the basis of these and other data elaborates the most likely outcome of each match.

In addition to the football tips of the algorithm, we also provide two bets of the day elaborated by our team of football betting experts: Doubling and Risk of the Day.
All the bet predictions are free!

---- SOCIAL FOOTBALL BETTING ------

Football betting becomes social!
You can follow the best tipsters in the application, copy their bets and become yourself a reference point for the community .

When you sign up you will receive 1000 virtual diamonds with which you can create virtual bets , both to test your gaming strategies and to challenge other tipsters and climb the rankings of the best tipsters of the day, week, month and ever.

The ranking is based on the profit generated by the tipster in the concerned period , so you can easily identify the best BetMines's tipster!
The best daily bets will be published on our social channels.
NB: You don't win any cash prizes, these are virtual bets ( and not real money ) with the aim of testing your gaming strategies and having fun at the same time!


---- TEAMS STATISTICS ------

For each team involved in the match we provide the results of the last 5 matches in general, the last 5 at home and the last 5 away games.
For the last 10 matches of each team we also provide:

- the percentage of results 1.5+,2.5+ and 3.5+ goals, Both team to score, 3 Way Result
- the mean of the corners
- Total goals
- Clean sheet matches

---- LEAGUE STATISTICS ----

For each league we supply:

- Standings
- Percentages of 1.5+,2.5+, 3.5+ goals and both team to score outcomes
- The minutes of the goals
- Average goal per game
- Average of yellow and red cards


---- BETMINES MACHINE.

title: BetConnect - Sports Betting
description:
Betconnect is the worlds only social betting network that gives you access to the bets of professional gamblers. We send you personalised bets - each called a Bet Request - direct from the Pros for you to Match.

What is betconnect?

In It Together

Crowd Betting

Every Bet Request you receive is just the útipù of the iceberg - our pros are using staking much much more.   Our technology intelligently splits the stake and distributes, via the betconnect network, to Punters like you, so you can share in their success.   

Time Is Money

Every Bet Request is so good you need to act fast to maximise value. Time is of the essence as you only have 15 minutes to Match and make your next decision¶

The Benefits Are All Yours!

When you Follow a Bet Request by placing it with other bookmakers you get to take advantage of their Free Bet, Money Back Special and Best Odds Guaranteed promotions. If you lay a Bet Request on betconnect and you beat the Pro you pay zero commission on your profits.

title: Sure Bet Predictions
description:

Usage:
To get bet predictions of different matches select the top-left corner menu bar to open navigation panel. Click on "Predictions", wait for data to load, then select match of interest when it finishes loading. To get Prediction and Tip, Click on the "View Tip". Tips are given after the reason for prediction decision at the bottom end of the view. Therefore, scroll down.
To see Football Betting Tips, without preview details, click on the top-left corner menu bar. Select "Tips", wait for data to load. When betting tips have loaded, scroll to league of interest. 

Further Details:
Tips sections has different statuses. If a game has not been played, it has no scores and is listed as "Not Played". Played matches with the prediction successful is marked as "Success". And finally "Failed" for Tip that went wrong. Sometimes games are cancelled and not played, thus we mark such matches as "Cancelled".

To get the best of our application, use it ever day, checking both predictions and betting tips listed.

Notifications:
We shall send notifications to prompt you of the best betting opportunities from time to time. Take advantage. To control notifications, go to settings and uncheck the respective box. We hope you will allow us to send you notifications.

title: Sure Bet
description:
Simple sure bet, or arbitrage bet, calculator for betting purposes.
A sure bet is a set of bets where you are sure to win money, irrespective of what the outcome of the event turns out to be. They exists because each bookmaker has another odd for a pick.
Enter best odds for 2 or 3 results in decimal format. After clicking on the Calculate button you will know if the match is a sure bet and how to share your total stake amount on each pick.

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again.

title: Valuebet App - Betting Tips
description:
The Valuebet App is a sports betting price comparison app to help Sports Bettors with betting tips and strategies to win more sports bets by comparing the price of their Odds to the Market price to determine its value. The key to successful sports betting or any form of gambling is to extract value from a bet. Value means that the odds you are getting is better than the 'Market' Odds. Finding underpriced odds and making consistent value bets will ensure long-term betting success. The app is a value bet calculator that simplifies the math for the user.

Sports bettors usually bet on emotions or bias information. Imagine before buying a phone, you do a price comparison. If the phone is priced on the market at $150, but you can buy it at $110, then you are getting value. Conversely, if the phone is priced at $100 and you are paying $110, then you are overpaying. This principle can be applied to Sports Betting. If you are paying $110 for a bet that should be priced at $150, then you are getting value.

Winning at sports betting in the long-term is not about picking winners, but about finding value. The Valuebet App helps sports bettor win more bets by allowing them to input the odds they receive, and compare it to the other odds available on the market. They will then be able to know which bet is a good value bet, and which bet is a bad bet.  This will prevent sports bettors from making bad bets where they overpay for a sports bet.

Key Features:
	¢	Input your Odds
	¢	Compare your Odds to the market
	¢	See if you are getting value based on the Value Points
	¢	Get notified whenever there is a big line movement
	¢	Only make bets where you are getting value
	¢	Win more Sports Bets
	¢	FREE to use everyday

Step 1: Sign up with your Name and Email
Step 2: Upon registration, you will receive 2 FREE tokens daily
Step 3: Go to the Available screen and see the games that you want to unlock
Step 4: Unlock the games you want, which will be moved to òWatching
Step 5: Go to òWatching screen and see the data about the games you unlocked
Step 6: Adjust the Odds and Price in òWatching to compare it to the market

See our FAQ for more details: http://valuebet.co/help-center/

Check out our Blog to learn how the Valuebet App can help you win more Sports Bets: http://valuebet.co/blog/


***The Value Bet Pro app is coming later, with many features and enhancements to make it even to make value bets. Make the value bet app the only sports betting app you'll ever need.***

The Valuebet app is not a sportsbook, and is not affiliated with any betting or gambling sites. The Valuebet is a sports betting app and tool that gives betting tips by comparing user's Odds against the Market Odds. 

The Valuebet App makes watching sports more enjoyable as a casual bettor by giving the user a value edge over the person they are betting with. Betting with you friends can let you enjoy things such as a win free meal, or  the next round of beer. 

Regardless whether you are a professional bettor who needs a simple by highly useful value bet app calculator, or a casual bettor looking for a small edge by finding value bets, the Valuebet App caters to both type. Check it out, you won't be disappointed.

title: bet$ave - Control Your Betting Activity
description:
bet$ave, aka betSave, is a must have app for all betting players for many reasons! It's a collection of some usefull functions to help you beat the booker and start making money from your betting! 

¢ Store your Bets

  With bet$ave you can control your betting activity by keeping all your bets in one 
  place. Each time you place a bet, no matter the betting provider, you open 
  bet$ave and save the bet you've just placed along with all its properties such as 
  its amount, its winnings its selections etc. Additionally you have the option to add a 
  screenshot of your bet. In this way, you know how much you win or lose at any time just 
  by tapping on "Totals" tab of  bet$ave app without having to visit all your betting 
  providers websites and calculate the win/loss for each one of them!

¢ Filter your Saved Bets

  You can filter your saved bets based on their properties, the date or the range of dates 
  they have been placed. In this way, you can see how you did with your betting during a 
  specific day or a specific period of time you choose. Additionally, by filtering your bets 
  based on their properties you can see in which way of betting you're doing better, 
  because you can see your Total Win/Loss in many betting categories such as Live 
  Betting, Pre-Match betting, betting on Singles, Doubles, Parlays etc.

¢ Betting Tips

  Betting tips section where you can find the best tips from our top tipsters. Updated in 
  daily basis to provide you with the most accurate picks from every days betting coupon!

¢ Betting tools

  Some betting tools have been added such as: 

  ¢ Odds Calculator to help you convert odds from one format to another. Decimal 
     Odds, Fractional Odds, American Odds and Implied Probability conversions are 
     supported!
 
  ¢ The Kelly Criterion to help you beat the booker from the inside. Be the 
     bookmaker yourself and pass this tool your probability for the outcome of an event and 
     if there's any value on the odds bookmaker offers then it will give you the optimal 
     amount of money you should invest on it relative to your betting bankroll!

  ¢ The Poisson Distribution to help you improve your betting by comparing the 
     odds this tool gives you with booker's odds. Pass this tool the attack and defence 
     strength for each team of the event you want to bet and as a result you will get the 
     odds, for almost all the markets of that specific event according to their average goals 
     scored and allowed. This would help you make an educated guess for the outcome of 
     the event you want to invest money at and finally make a profit out of it!

  Tools updates and more betting tools to come in the upcoming versions of 
  bet$ave.

¢ Share Your Bets With Friends

  Share your bet photos with your friends of any social network or messaging app with a 
  single tap. Let them know about your winnings and show off your betting skills!

¢ Access bet$ave from everywhere

  By creating a bet$ave account you can access your saved bets from everywhere. 
  You just have to download bet$ave app from google play, sign in with your 
  bet$ave account and you're all set!

Fate rewards the bold, and sometimes its advisable to go completely overboard with your bets. Predictor for Friends takes the regular playtime and added time into consideration ì no matter the results after a penalty shootout. So betting on a draw isnt an insensible thing to do even in a big tournament.

Additionally, you can place a Champion Bet in every competition. Intuition, analysis, it doesnt matter: Betting on the right champion gives you bonus points in every competition!

GROUPS & GLOBAL RANKINGS

Group rankings turn friends into competitors: Whoever gains the highest amount of points betting receives the crown at the end of the season. Matchday rankings shorten the intervals between celebrations, since everyones might be having good or bad days betting.

And of course being at the top of the global rankings is where its at! Will your group make it among the Top 100?

Theres only one time for football ì everywhere, all year! You wont miss another match with Predictor for Friends, staying connected to what matters most: Your friends and football.

Download Predictor for Friends and see for yourselves!

Have a great football season and good luck betting!

title: Wannabet - Bet 365 Days a Year With Your Friends
description:
Wannabet - Prove youre better

Bet with friends and without money! Wannabet is the first peer-to-peer betting app that allows you to bet free with your friends and bet rivals. Choose the game you want, create a wager and show your betting skills to the players around the world. Wannabet provides you an experience of betting without losing and risk as all the coins stay between players and not going to the third party. Wannabet can be played without giving any deposit which allows you to play this game on your terms! Accept or decline live bets for matches played at the moment.
 
If you ever wondered where to bet on sports online with your friends or rival fans, Wannabet is an app for you. Bet 365 days in a year with your friends or rivals and climb the leaderboard to prove youre the best predictor there is.
We connect you with players all around the globe and let you bet fair with them on the terms you as players chose. No more unfair odds. Scroll to the list of available matchups and choose yourself which bet is the best for you or create your terms and wait for someone to think the opposite way. If you ever felt like bet can never be won by betting in traditional brick and mortar betting houses, you will have to give Wannabet a try. Using this app represents going back to the roots as Wannabet is bringing betting to what it was in the first place - a fair wager between two people thinking the opposite ways.

Create private leagues and more with our Leagues feature, bet on live matches and never have a dull moment when watching sports. Wannabet is created by players for players and we strive to create a community of betting experts who will play and compete with each other and not against the betting house. 

Being big sports fans we were always excited when game days approached and our favorite teams were about to play. This excitement was much higher when the game was against the rival teams. But we wondered how to make it even more exciting? How could we compete against rival fans? And most importantly, how can we make this process simple and seamless?

That is why Wannabet was created. It allows users to create bets and engage in bets on their terms. Using the latest technology, Wannabet will allow people from all around the world to bet against their friends, rival fans or whoever they want, and Wannabet will ensure fairness of the outcome and winnings allocation. Finally, we are using virtual currency, because Wannabet is about excitement and competition, and not false promises of unrealistic monetary gains.

FIBA World Cup 2019 Beta

After the beta testing of the FIFA World Cup last year, we decided to go through one more phase of testing the concept. Bet on outcomes, number of points and live stats in a tournament which will be in focus of all basketball lovers this summer. Be the best predictor of the tournament and earn the role of Wannabet MVP from 31st of August until the 15th of September during the FIBA World Cup 2019. Get the chance to prove the basketball world that you know what will happen next and earn those bragging rights!

description:

Your objective is to win all of the money¶ and survive long enough to spend it!

Heroes include Michonne, Glenn, Ezekiel, Carl, Jesus, Morgan, Carol, and many more. Send your heroes on supply runs to collect valuable resources, and use Resource Chests to level up each hero for the ultimate credit payout!

Each top-quality slot machine immerses you in classic moments from the series like Rick and Negans epic battle in úShowdownù! Relive other iconic moments on machines including:

The Hospital
óè	Go back to where it all started and help Sheriff Rick Grimes break free from the hospital where he was left for dead. 
óè	Match Wild úDont Open, Dead Insideù doors to rack up huge wins, BONUS SPINS, and fill up Ricks health bar. 
óè	Fill Ricks health bar all the way to escape the hospital, triggering a bonus pick-game that lets you loot your way out of the hospital collecting gigantic payouts along the way. 

The Prison
óè	Featuring fan-favorites Glenn, Carl, Michonne, and Rick. 
óè	Collect Sheriff Badges to trigger the progressive mini-game úClear the Yardù, where youll fight your way through The Yard and three cell blocks with increasing multiplier bonuses and millions of credits to be won! 
óè	Includes an additional úGo Wildù bonus game that lets you choose one of two ways to win big. 
óè	Fill the entire board with Sheriff Badges for the GRAND JACKPOT!

Survivors
óè	Choose your survivor to go against the walker horde: Michonne, Daryl, Morgan, or Carol. 
óè	Fill the first column with your chosen hero to trigger FREE RESPINS!
óè	Collect bullets to fill up your clip, triggering a unique mini-game where youll team up with the rest of the survivors to spin your way to enormous payouts with multiplier bonuses. 

Dont let your guard down, because theres always a walkerîand a new way to winîright around the corner: 

óè	Limited-Time Events: Be prepared to take on the challenge of limited-time events for the ultimate payouts. 
óè	Mini-Games: Spin to win on multiple levels, with mini-games that open up new bonuses and endless ways to win big.
óè	PvP Tournaments: Compete in timed spin-offs to see who will survive, and who will thrive. 
óè	Collectible Heroes: Ongoing heroic seasons will give players the chance to win up to 8 iconic heroes from The Walking Dead each season.
óè	Resource Chests: Complete special objectives to win Resource Chests loaded with XP bonuses to level up your heroes.

title: Gambling Therapy
description:
A free app providing a collection of tools and information to help you identify and overcome problem gambling.
 
Download the GT app if you feel that any of these things describe you or someone you care about:
 
¢ you feel that you are preoccupied with gambling
¢ previous attempts to cut or stop gambling have failed
¢ you feel the need to increase your bets 
¢ you gamble when you feel stressed or upset
¢ you gamble to try and win back your losses
¢ you attempt to conceal the extent of your gambling
¢ you struggling financially because of your gambling
¢ your relationships are suffering because of your gambling
 
Problem gambling (sometimes referred to as gambling addiction) is an urge to gamble despite mounting negative consequences. The Gambling Therapy app has been designed to help those that are struggling with problem gambling by providing easy to access information and straightforward tools.
 
Key features of the Gambling Therapy app are:
 
¢ self assessment questionnaire
¢ text based live support
¢ mindfulness and self help exercises
¢ crisis support information
¢ daily motivational quotes
¢ links to blocking software
¢ directory of organisations that can help
¢ access to the GT online forums
 
Gambling Therapy is part of the Gordon Moody Association - a registered charity with over 40 years experience in providing support and treatment for problem gambling.

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app

title: Block Gambling Websites And Apps - Gamban
description:
Try Gamban for 7 days with our risk-free trial.

Gamban is the most single most powerful and cost-effective online gambling blocking app, offering full unlimited protection across all of your devices for only £24.99 per year.

Gamban is a user-friendly, transparent and non-intrusive piece of software that can be downloaded on an Android, iOS, Windows and macOS device, blocking users from 1000s of worldwide online gambling websites and apps.

Has Gamban helped you block gambling? Share your story as a review and let others know!
_______

About Gamban:
Used by thousands of people worldwide, Gamban has received an overwhelming amount of positive feedback, with some users informing the team that it has literally saved lives. Taking the first step continues to be the hardest challenge and much of our time goes into making Gamban as simple and straightforward to install as possible.

In 2018 GambleAware commissioned independent research to evaluate the effectiveness of blocking software and to compare existing products. Gamban emerged the most effective and, as a result, Gamban has been provided free of charge through all Gamcare support networks in the UK.

In 2018, Gamban was awarded Software Rising Star Award at the EGR B2B Awards and in 2019, Gamban won RegTech Provider of the Year at The GamblingCompliance Global Regulatory Awards.

Ensuring that industry adheres to effective self-exclusion guidelines and adopts practical player protection methodologies is a large part of what makes Gamban and self-exclusion successful.
_______

Gamban Features:
Block access to thousands of gambling websites
Quick and easy installation
Available across all platforms
Blocks Facebook gambling games
Access to useful Gamban resources
On-Demand live technical support
_______

Easy Installation:
Easy, quick installation and complete protection across all of your devices, whether you are installing Gamban to protect yourself, your employees or a family member from gambling related harm.

Gambling Blocking:
Simply and effectively block yourself from 10,000s of online gambling sites and apps worldwide, including illegal and unregulated gambling organisations. 

Helpful Resources:
You'll gain access to your very own user dashboard you can manage your devices and access useful resources to help you on your road to recovery, while you block gambling on your devices.

We also offer full technical support, including an extensive library of useful articles, FAQs and video guides as well as live chat with our experts.

Uninstallation:
Gamban has been specifically designed to not allow users to uninstall the app while their exclusion period is running. We recommend you test Gamban thoroughly during your free trial, and if you encounter any issues to contact us at info@gamban.com.

Troubleshooting:
We are always continually working to improve Gamban and the services we offer with regular, automatic updates as we understand that you rely on us in your time of need. 

If any issue arises and you're in need of support, please don't hesitate to visit our support centre https://gamban.zendesk.com/hc/en-us, or contact us at info@gamban.com.
_______

F.A.Qs

How do I know if Gamban is compatible with my device?
You can use our online compatibility checker - https://gamban.com/compatibility.

How many devices can I install Gamban on?
You can install Gamban on an all of your personal devices*.
*Subject to our terms of fair use

What if I have an older version of Android / iOS / Windows / macOS?
We always recommend having the most up-to-date version of an operating system (OS) on your device for maximum compatibility.

Will I be able to remove Gamban from my device if I change my mind?
No, Gamban is designed to protect people who have gambling addictions, meaning they are likely to change their mind after installation. In order to protect our customers from relapse, we do not allow customers to remove gamban from their devices.

title: Gambling Addiction, how to stop gambling
description:
Learn tools to cope with your addiction to gambling.

** Download Today and learn the following.

*Learn what gambling addiction is.
*Learn ways to stop gambling.
*Understand the myths about gambling and the consequences. 
*Understand the negative side effects on you and your family.
*Test yourself, read the self-test to see if you have a problem with gambling.

What is Gambling?

Gambling addiction is an urge to gamble continuously despite harmful negative consequences or a desire to stop. Problem gambling is often defined by whether harm is experienced by the gambler or others, rather than by the gambler's behaviour.

Severe problem gambling may be diagnosed as clinical pathological gambling if the gambler meets certain criteria. Pathological gambling is a common disorder that is associated with both social and family costs.

Individuals suffering from compulsive gambling, are novelty seekers, feel disconnected (dissociated), relaxed, or aroused while gambling. 

Research shows individuals who have money problems, win large amounts of money early into gambling, suffer rec losses like divorce, job losses are at an increased risk of developing compulsive gambling.

Symptoms of a gambling addiction may include:
1. A preoccupation with gambling and loss of interest in other hobbies.
2. Increasing the quantities gambled to recoup lost bets or to experience the same thrill.
3. A negative impact upon relationships with those closest to you.
4. Concealing the amount of money and time spent betting from family members.
5. Stealing money in order to gamble.
6. Denial that you have a problem.
In addition to these, you may also suffer from physical symptoms. These symptoms may include anxiety,
irritability, headaches, stomach aches and stress-related symptoms

title: Cherry Chaser Slot Machine
description:
With Cherry Chaser fruit machine you can play as much as you like, as often as you like, entirely for free.

This free slot machine game has Nudges, Steppa-win, Stoppa-win, Win-spins and the special Cherry Chaser feature for big payouts! This fruit machine is feature packed and sure to keep you entertained.

Slot machine features:
- Nudges: Automatic nudge to nearest best win.
- StoppaWin: Choose your win, collect what you see or wait for a better win line.
- SteppaWin: Step down the reels to match the reel that you choose.
- WinSpins: The slot machine keeps spinning wins, and the slot machine keeps paying out.

title: Iowa Gambling Game: Decision Making With Cards
description:
Think you can be in the elite 5% and solve the classic Iowa Gambling Game?! üèÜ Find out with this latest take on a classic psychology experiment. 

Based on a famous psychology experiment called Iowa gambling task, Iowa Gambling Game is designed to help players with decision making using a simulated card game. üé¥ It is commonly used to research brain activity in people through the analysis of cognition and emotional responses.ü§î It involves taking risks that result in rewards or penalties, just like many life decisions we make on a daily basis.

Here are the rules of the game:
û°Ô∏èThe player draws cards from each deck until he or she draws 100 cards. üíØ
û°Ô∏èEach card allows you to win or lose money. ü§ëüí∞üí≤
û°Ô∏èThere is a scorekeeper at the bottom of the screen to keep track of the scores
û°Ô∏èAfter the player has drawn 100 cards, the user needs to select which 2 decks have the most wins and are considered the best decks. 
û°Ô∏èThe best decks vary between each game. 
û°Ô∏èThe rules can also be viewed by tapping on the blue question mark icon. 

If you enjoy strategy games like Yahtzee or Solitaire, then you will enjoy this game.

This is a solo game but feel free to share it with friends who enjoy classic strategy card games.

We hope you have fun playing this exciting game! üòÉ

title: Blackjack
description:
Blackjack by Brainium captures what makes blackjack such an exhilarating game, while making the experience easy, beautiful, and intuitive for your Android phone or tablet. Best of all, there are NO in-app purchases for getting chips in our casino game! 

Tap the chips to adjust your bet, and watch the gorgeous, crisp, and beautifully animated cards fly on the table. 

If you're unsure of your strategy, ask the dealer for a hint at any time. 

Helpful bubbles assist you to quickly add up your cards, or decide whether you should take a hit on a soft value. 

Take advantage of advanced blackjack 21 strategies, like splitting multiple times and doubling down, to win big!

Practice your card counting skills by tracking the deck transition animation.

We love our players so we made sure that you don't spend any money in our blackjack twentyone game to get more chips. Blackjack 21 free by Brainium is completely free to play and all the chips and money used in the game are fictitious. 

Give Blackjack by Brainium a try and we promise you will have a fantastic experience. With the new skills you pick up youll feel more confident for your next trip to Vegas!

A note regarding the odds of winning Blackjack free:

Like all casino games, the odds of winning are slightly in favor of the casino. In our game, we use a cryptographically strong randomizer to shuffle the decks to make the game as authentic as possible. The game of blackjack is not meant to be òwon but is instead a game of both strategy and chance, resulting in both wins and losses. The unfavorable hands are meant to make the following winning streaks that much sweeter :)

Blackjack 21 Rules: 

Blackjack, also known as 21, is one of the most popular casino games in the world. Blackjack is a card game where players compete against the dealer. The object of the game is to reach 21 or to reach a score higher than the dealer without exceeding 21. 

In Blackjack free by Brainium, the dealer must draw to 16 and stand on soft 17. Blackjack pays 3 to 2, and insurance pays 2 to 1. 

Blackjack 21 Highlights & Features: 

- Gorgeous, beautifully animated cards 
- Touch and interact with all of your chips 
- Split hands or double down to win big 
- Buy insurance to dodge a dealer blackjack 
- Surrender to get out of a tough situation

title: Gambling Addiction Therapy - Get Professional Help
description:
Our online therapists are here to offer you all the help, support and professional tools you'll need to conquer your gambling addiction. We are here for you in those key moments when confronted with the impulse to engage in gambling in spite of being aware of the negative effects gambling has on your life.
	
We offer you nothing less than the best and most compassionate, caring therapists that will accompany you in every step of the way, and provide you with workable tools and boundless encouragement to battle your addiction.
	
The Gambling Addiction therapy app is designed in a way that provides each individual with the most precise therapy along with a comprehensive toolkit of advanced counseling techniques: 

¢	Match with your therapist by a personalized questionnaire
¢	Leave a message to your therapist at all hours
¢	Receive assistance anytime and from anywhere
¢	Choose you preferred method of communication
¢	Online community support for those who desire
¢	Extended education center free for all app users

Being accompanied by an online therapist has been proven to make a world of difference when coping with gambling rehab. When it comes to gambling treatment, over 94% of users are reporting significant progress and over 92% stated they prefer the online therapy method over a therapist's office.

Who we are and what we do
The Gambling Addiction therapy site is a collaborative effort by fully qualified and educated therapists specializing in gambling addiction - to provide 24/7 support to anyone who seeks it.
Following official guidelines similar to those of gamblers anonymous, we offer completely discreet online therapy conducted through secure means of communication via phone, text chat etc. 

Recognizing the symptoms of a gambling problem
The emotion behind compulsive gambling, as described and articulated by many addicted gamblers, is that of being preoccupied with the need to engage in this action, often triggered by feelings of stress or distress.
This behavior pattern is inevitably followed by the need for winning back gambling losses and increasing bet amounts - resulting in gambling substantial debt.

In other words, the effort to quit gambling is overcome by a stronger impulse realized as part of a gambling disorder, impacting one's life both financially as well as having an effect on personal relationships.

Education center - understanding the gamblers psyche

o	Learn all about the symptoms and rationality of pathological gambling
o	Recognize the patterns that drive the addicted gambler behavior
o	Get to know subtleties such as betting vs. gambling

With the Gambling Addiction Therapy site you're in the best of hands. Install the Gambling Addiction Therapy app and start gaining the confidence needed to face and defeat your gambling addiction!

title: Power Crazy Fruit Machine Slots Game
description:
Power Crazy fruit machine is a "Just for Fun" fruit machine simulator game, also known as a slot machine or Slots!

Just like on a real fruit machine, the aim of the game is to enter the feature board and win some virtual cash! This can be done by matching 3 fruits on the winline, or by filling one of the three trails by collecting numbers which are super-imposed on the reels.

Stop the the reels on a bonus and get extra mini-games to increase your chances of winning some virtual cash!  The bonuses include:

Trail Skill
Boost
Respin
Stoppa
Trail Shot
Selecta

The feature game consists of 3 towers, one with nudges, one with features and another with cash.  You can gamble higher or lower on the dice to climb the towers for better wins!  If you 

meet an exchance point, you can swap onto a new tower.  Example, you can convert your cash into feature of nudges!  When you exchange, you are also given a "step"..  This allows you to 

change the dice number to a better one for a greater chance of winning the gambles!  The number reel is nto sequential (1 to 12) so, for example, stepping on an 8 will give you a 1!

If you collect a nudge win, the win will automatically be nudged onto the win-line, you will be transferred to the cash tower where you can continue your feature game.

If the Power Crazy logo beins to flash, you cannot lose!  You could gamble lower than a 2, and the machine would give you a 1!  Go for the jackpot repeater!

This fruit machine game includes lots of mini games and hidden tricks including Holds, Hold 3 Times For A Win and the classic Hi / Lo Gamble system!


Some of the classic fruit machine features offered are:

Power Gamble
Super Hold
Nearest Win
Pick a Win
Skill Cash
Flash Cash
Winspins
Reel Skill
Fruit Maze
ShockRoll
High Voltage
Jackpot Repeater
Cashpot

There are two modes of play. A quick game will let you play infinitely just for fun! The Challenge mode allows you to compete in the weekly leader boards!

All game wins and losses are virtual, no real money can be won or lost on this fun game.

If you are a fan of casino pub fruit machines, slot machine games or slots, this game is sure to keep you entertained!

title: Gambling Therapy
description:
A free app providing a collection of tools and information to help you identify and overcome problem gambling.
 
Download the GT app if you feel that any of these things describe you or someone you care about:
 
¢ you feel that you are preoccupied with gambling
¢ previous attempts to cut or stop gambling have failed
¢ you feel the need to increase your bets 
¢ you gamble when you feel stressed or upset
¢ you gamble to try and win back your losses
¢ you attempt to conceal the extent of your gambling
¢ you struggling financially because of your gambling
¢ your relationships are suffering because of your gambling
 
Problem gambling (sometimes referred to as gambling addiction) is an urge to gamble despite mounting negative consequences. The Gambling Therapy app has been designed to help those that are struggling with problem gambling by providing easy to access information and straightforward tools.
 
Key features of the Gambling Therapy app are:
 
¢ self assessment questionnaire
¢ text based live support
¢ mindfulness and self help exercises
¢ crisis support information
¢ daily motivational quotes
¢ links to blocking software
¢ directory of organisations that can help
¢ access to the GT online forums
 
Gambling Therapy is part of the Gordon Moody Association - a registered charity with over 40 years experience in providing support and treatment for problem gambling.

Used by thousands of people worldwide, Gamban has received an overwhelming amount of positive feedback, with some users informing the team that it has literally saved lives. Taking the first step continues to be the hardest challenge and much of our time goes into making Gamban as simple and straightforward to install as possible.

In 2018 GambleAware commissioned independent research to evaluate the effectiveness of blocking software and to compare existing products. Gamban emerged the most effective and, as a result, Gamban has been provided free of charge through all Gamcare support networks in the UK.

In 2018, Gamban was awarded Software Rising Star Award at the EGR B2B Awards and in 2019, Gamban won RegTech Provider of the Year at The GamblingCompliance Global Regulatory Awards.

title: Bet Blocker
description:
Support can be reached at admin@betblocker.org. Responses will be provided within 48 hours.

Leaving negative reviews without contacting support is actively harmful to others experiencing issues with gambling addiction. As of 19/02/2020 BetBlocker has been downloaded over 10k times. We have 3.8k people (+approx 10/day) actively using the app. Of the 198 reviews we have received, 70 of them are 1 star. Almost without exception those reviews relate to technical issues with the users handset/network that could be resolved by either contacting support, or are only resolveable by contact their network provider. The majority of these users never contacted support even after we responded to them. 

The small proportion of our users who choose to use Play Store reviews to vent have a disproportionately negative impact on BetBlocker's store rating when considered against the THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE USING THE APP WITHOUT ISSUE. Using Play Store reviews in this manner discourages other people experiencing gambling addiction from seeking help. We're happy to receive negative reviews where appropriate, but leaving negative reviews before or instead of contacting support hurts other users. Please ensure you have actually tried to contact support before posting reviews.

--------------------------------------

BetBlocker is a free tool to help you control your gambling. Install it on as many devices as you like and you can block yourself from accessing over 5700 gambling websites. You can select how long you want to be blocked for.

- All users should be aware that once activated the app CANNOT be removed until your exclusion period has been concluded. For testing purposes we would recommend that all users trial BetBlocker in 'Parental Control' mode where it can be disarmed via your chosen password to ensure it does what you need it to do before you activate a 'Gambling Self-Restriction' that locks the device for the selected duration.

- If you experience a technical issue please contact support either through the app, via the contact us form on our site or by emailing admin@betblocker.org. Remember to include your email address or we will not be able to respond to you.

- Users should be aware that our support sevice will NOT help you remove the app. If there is a technical issue we will look to provide a fix for this issue. We will NOT remove the block while our Development Team works on the issue.

- If you find a url that has not been restricted that should be restricted please use the in app 'Suggest a website to block' feature or contact us on admin@betblocker.org. When we add a site to the restricted list it will take 24 hours to reflect at the user's end and you will need to restart your device.

Please keep in mind when contacting support that BetBlocker is a charity staffed by volunteers. 

Users should also be aware that we will not disarm the app because "someone else installed this on my device" or because you tell us you are "selling my device". We have no reliable method of proving either of these claims and we have to prioritise minimising the risk of exposing a potentially vulnerable individual to gambling again. 

While we understand it can be frustrating waiting for a technical issue to be resolved or where we refuse to disarm the app at your request, many of our users have significant addictive tendencies connected with gambling. Where you activate a Gambling Self-Restriction you are making a statement that you do not want to be allowed the choice to remove this restriction before the selected restriction period has concluded. You agree to this in our terms of service.

We will only ever disarm the app as a last possible resort, where we have fully researched your issue and concluded that we will not be able to offer a fix.


This app uses the Device Administrator permission. Activating this admin app will allow to BetBlocker to perform to following operations: 

1. Activate this device admin app
2. Cancel
3. Uninstall app

title: Gambling Addiction Therapy - Get Professional Help
description:
Our online therapists are here to offer you all the help, support and professional tools you'll need to conquer your gambling addiction. We are here for you in those key moments when confronted with the impulse to engage in gambling in spite of being aware of the negative effects gambling has on your life.
	
We offer you nothing less than the best and most compassionate, caring therapists that will accompany you in every step of the way, and provide you with workable tools and boundless encouragement to battle your addiction.
	
The Gambling Addiction therapy app is designed in a way that provides each individual with the most precise therapy along with a comprehensive toolkit of advanced counseling techniques: 

¢	Match with your therapist by a personalized questionnaire
¢	Leave a message to your therapist at all hours
¢	Receive assistance anytime and from anywhere
¢	Choose you preferred method of communication
¢	Online community support for those who desire
¢	Extended education center free for all app users

Being accompanied by an online therapist has been proven to make a world of difference when coping with gambling rehab. When it comes to gambling treatment, over 94% of users are reporting significant progress and over 92% stated they prefer the online therapy method over a therapist's office.

Who we are and what we do
The Gambling Addiction therapy site is a collaborative effort by fully qualified and educated therapists specializing in gambling addiction - to provide 24/7 support to anyone who seeks it.
Following official guidelines similar to those of gamblers anonymous, we offer completely discreet online therapy conducted through secure means of communication via phone, text chat etc. 

Recognizing the symptoms of a gambling problem
The emotion behind compulsive gambling, as described and articulated by many addicted gamblers, is that of being preoccupied with the need to engage in this action, often triggered by feelings of stress or distress.
This behavior pattern is inevitably followed by the need for winning back gambling losses and increasing bet amounts - resulting in gambling substantial debt.

In other words, the effort to quit gambling is overcome by a stronger impulse realized as part of a gambling disorder, impacting one's life both financially as well as having an effect on personal relationships.

Education center - understanding the gamblers psyche

o	Learn all about the symptoms and rationality of pathological gambling
o	Recognize the patterns that drive the addicted gambler behavior
o	Get to know subtleties such as betting vs. gambling

With the Gambling Addiction Therapy site you're in the best of hands. Install the Gambling Addiction Therapy app and start gaining the confidence needed to face and defeat your gambling addiction!

title: Gambling Addiction, how to stop gambling
description:
Learn tools to cope with your addiction to gambling.

** Download Today and learn the following.

*Learn what gambling addiction is.
*Learn ways to stop gambling.
*Understand the myths about gambling and the consequences. 
*Understand the negative side effects on you and your family.
*Test yourself, read the self-test to see if you have a problem with gambling.

What is Gambling?

Gambling addiction is an urge to gamble continuously despite harmful negative consequences or a desire to stop. Problem gambling is often defined by whether harm is experienced by the gambler or others, rather than by the gambler's behaviour.

Severe problem gambling may be diagnosed as clinical pathological gambling if the gambler meets certain criteria. Pathological gambling is a common disorder that is associated with both social and family costs.

Individuals suffering from compulsive gambling, are novelty seekers, feel disconnected (dissociated), relaxed, or aroused while gambling. 

Research shows individuals who have money problems, win large amounts of money early into gambling, suffer rec losses like divorce, job losses are at an increased risk of developing compulsive gambling.

Symptoms of a gambling addiction may include:
1. A preoccupation with gambling and loss of interest in other hobbies.
2. Increasing the quantities gambled to recoup lost bets or to experience the same thrill.
3. A negative impact upon relationships with those closest to you.
4. Concealing the amount of money and time spent betting from family members.
5. Stealing money in order to gamble.
6. Denial that you have a problem.
In addition to these, you may also suffer from physical symptoms. These symptoms may include anxiety,
irritability, headaches, stomach aches and stress-related symptoms

title: Iowa Gambling Game: Decision Making With Cards
description:
Think you can be in the elite 5% and solve the classic Iowa Gambling Game?! üèÜ Find out with this latest take on a classic psychology experiment. 

Based on a famous psychology experiment called Iowa gambling task, Iowa Gambling Game is designed to help players with decision making using a simulated card game. üé¥ It is commonly used to research brain activity in people through the analysis of cognition and emotional responses.ü§î It involves taking risks that result in rewards or penalties, just like many life decisions we make on a daily basis.

Here are the rules of the game:
û°Ô∏èThe player draws cards from each deck until he or she draws 100 cards. üíØ
û°Ô∏èEach card allows you to win or lose money. ü§ëüí∞üí≤
û°Ô∏èThere is a scorekeeper at the bottom of the screen to keep track of the scores
û°Ô∏èAfter the player has drawn 100 cards, the user needs to select which 2 decks have the most wins and are considered the best decks. 
û°Ô∏èThe best decks vary between each game. 
û°Ô∏èThe rules can also be viewed by tapping on the blue question mark icon. 

If you enjoy strategy games like Yahtzee or Solitaire, then you will enjoy this game.

This is a solo game but feel free to share it with friends who enjoy classic strategy card games.

We hope you have fun playing this exciting game! üòÉ
